title: Education Skill Gap Diagnoser
reason: We need this skill because human capability growth requires targeted planning under constraints. This specific skill identifies where agents and humans need capability upgrades.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Education Skill Gap Diagnoser`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to persistent skill gaps and poor learning outcomes.
Design and version the input/output contract for skill profiles, learning paths, and support resources, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using competency coverage analysis, and produce skill gap reports with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover persistent skill gaps and poor learning outcomes, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.

traceability.scopeStep: Define the scope and success metrics for `Education Skill Gap Diagnoser`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to persistent skill gaps and poor learning outcomes.

traceability.coreStep: Implement the core capability using competency coverage analysis, and produce skill gap reports with deterministic scoring.
traceability.orchestrationStep: Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
traceability.validationStep: Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover persistent skill gaps and poor learning outcomes, then run regression baselines.
traceability.rolloutStep: Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
